If the selected case was a variant..description: Result object if type is variant.

preorderThreshold.description: The pre-order threshold of the child SKU.

backorderLevel.description: The back-order level of the child SKU.

displayName.description: The display name of the SKU.

availabilityDate.description: The date when the SKU will be available.

stockThreshold.description: The stock threshold of the child SKU.

availabilityStatusMsg.description: The current availability status of the child SKU.

stockLevel.description: The stock level of the SKU.

availableToPromise.description: The available to promise of the child SKU.

skuNumber.description: The SKU number of the SKU.

preorderLevel.description: The pre-order level of the child SKU.

locationId.description: The location ID of the child SKU.

inventoryId.description: The inventory ID of the SKU.

backorderThreshold.description: The back-order threshold of the child SKU.

availabilityStatus.description: The availability status of the child SKU.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the SKU.

If the selected case was a product..description: Result object if type is product.

childSKUs.description: List of SKU's for the product.

preorderThreshold.description: The pre-order threshold of the child SKU.

backorderLevel.description: The back-order level of the child SKU.

displayName.description: The display name of the SKU.

availabilityDate.description: The date when the SKU will be available.

stockThreshold.description: The stock threshold of the child SKU.

availabilityStatusMsg.description: The current availability status of the child SKU.

stockLevel.description: The stock level of the SKU.

availableToPromise.description: The available to promise of the child SKU.

skuNumber.description: The SKU number of the SKU.

preorderLevel.description: The pre-order level of the child SKU.

locationId.description: The location ID of the child SKU.

inventoryId.description: The inventory ID of the SKU.

backorderThreshold.description: The back-order threshold of the child SKU.

availabilityStatus.description: The availability status of the child SKU.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the SKU.

totalStockLevel.description: The total stock level of the product.

stockStatus.description: The current stock status of the product (inStock or outOfStock).
